answers.answer: Have you had your blood pressure checked? And I don't mean just once or twice at the DR. You should keep a log of your BP's for 2 weeks and then let the DR see what happens, you should go to the fire department and have them check it once every day! Your symptoms sound like it could be related to your blood pressure. Don't feel afraid to ask Fire department to check it that is what they are there for...I know because I worked in the ER for 3 years!
With the heartbeat in your ears, have you been checked for diabetes? Hope you have had something to help you before now :)

question: For about 4-5 months, am experiencing extreme pressure in my head with severe headaches.  also have sensation of heartbeat in my ear and behind my eyes.  Dr. dx Mastoiditis with help of MRI; gave antibiotics and nose sprays,  short relief period.Could this be carotid-related problem?  I am overweight, I smoke and am afraid I am at great risk of stroke?
title: head pressure and feeling my heartbeat in my ear
